content: {"name": "Mother of Mercy House", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Visit Monday and Tuesday to register, pick-up is by appointment only and will be on Thursdays. \nhttps://nutritionaldevelopmentservices.org/covid19/ ", "email": "", "url": "https://nutritionaldevelopmentservices.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "720 East Alleghany Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19134", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.99668667654435, "longitude": -75.11616213477365}, "phones": [{"number": "(267) 951-2094", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
